name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Stephen R. SIGNORE, Jr., Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Signore
docket_number: No. 148 Disciplinary Docket No. 3; Disciplinary Board No. 116 DB 95

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Stephen R. SIGNORE, Jr., Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 12th day of September, 1995, there having been filed with this Court by Stephen R. Signore, Jr., his verified Statement of Resignation dated August 12, 1995, stating that he desires to resign from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania in accordance with the provisions of Rule 215, Pa.R.D.E„ it is
ORDERED that the resignation of Stephen R. Signore, Jr., be and it is hereby accepted and he is DISBARRED ON CONSENT from the Bar of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania; and it is further ORDERED that he shall comply with the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E. Respondent shall pay costs, if any, to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
664 A.2d 1341
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner v. Stephen R. SIGNORE, Jr., Respondent.
No. 148 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Disciplinary Board No. 116 DB 95.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 12, 1995.
